programme.title: Pordioseros Y Ladrones
programme.desc: It seemed that Eduardo had it all, however, life turned its back on him after a betrayal that left him on the street. His godfather is a beggar who will confront the cartel that took absolutely everything from him.

programme.title: Maldita Sucia
programme.desc: Julio is a humble man who lives in love with the most beautiful woman in town, but she is a cold and ambitious woman, who only looks for men out of interest and gives herself to the highest bidder.

programme.title: Dominium
programme.desc: Three friends want to film a documentary about urban legends. After they unexpectedly interrupt a strange ceremony at an cemetery, they meet a nurse who loves to install cameras wherever paranormal activities occur. Together they will unfold a horror as never seen before.

programme.title: Immortal Kiss: Queen Of The Night
programme.desc: Queen Vampire searches for the perfect mate.

programme.title: Live Escape
programme.desc: Two cops investigate an eerie empty homeless shelter with an endless maze of spaces and are attacked by zombies. They discover how these zombies were created. What will happen if zombies escape into the city?

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: When a powerful drug lord forbids kidnappings on his territories, there is only a man enforcing this rule: Comandante Anthrax.

programme.title: Delivery Boy
programme.desc: An inept delivery boy takes a package with sensitive information and is confused with El Tiburón, a dangerous spy. Now, Agent Azul must try to stop this delivery thru a city in the middle of a pandemic, while El Tiburón tries to recover the package and unleash a terrorist attack in Florida with the codes it contains and this Delivery Boy just tries to do its unassuming job.

programme.title: El Nuevo Narcotraficante
programme.desc: Octavio Beltrán rose out of poverty thanks to drug dealing. Obsessed with being the best, he defies his former boss, El Sultan, and takes over the complete business. But his new worst enemy is ready to fight back and use every tool possible to get back to the top of the criminal underworld.

programme.title: They Call Her Headhunter
programme.desc: The wife of a nefarious TV Evangelist hires a savage bounty hunter known as the Headhunter to kidnap her husband and inflict terrible pain before killing him off. But things are not all what they seem in the world of ‘saving lives’ as the Headhunter discovers a very dark and wicked secret inside this cult.

programme.title: Sex Game
programme.desc: Rachel and Ryan are two popular influencers who will do anything to get a few more likes and win the next virtual challenge.

programme.title: Rust 2
programme.desc: After the horrific ordeal and the loss of her friends, Heather is forced to return to Hotel Fear where Travis prepares for his next victims, Heather must fight once again.

programme.title: Prediccion Fatal
programme.desc: A tarot reading seems to point to Manuel as the one who caused the death of Acrisio, an unscrupulous politician who is the father of Danna, this young man's girlfriend. Now Manuel must run to save his life and free Danna.

programme.title: En Mis Propias Manos
programme.desc: The wife of a police officer is molested, beaten and mentally and physically abused. Other police officers suspect that something is happening, but the woman is afraid to speak up and accuse her abuser.

programme.title: Madres Michoacanas
programme.desc: When criminals take Michoacan, the women of the town fear for their children, who could be drafted by the new mafia.

programme.title: Los Primos Rivales
programme.desc: A cop faces off with his own cousin, a drug dealer, in a battle where both has everything to lose.
